main event: A round, brilliant blue-white object was observed at Elmendorf AFB in Alaska on December 15, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a silver dollar at arm's length,The edges of the object appeared fuzzy,It trailed black smoke before bursting into yellow flames,The sighting lasted approximately 8 seconds,The observer concluded it was likely a meteor from the Geminids shower.
witness description: The sighting was visually observed by a pilot while airborne.
